none: W.D. Freeman Perfumer, New York and Cincinnati. Text: "Invisible--harmless as dew--conceals blemishes. Made in White, Pink, and Cream or Brunette shades, the color of this envelop designating the shade of the powder within." Application instructions on reverse.
